issue.title: SystemSetupDockerInstall should contain the docker installation step

content.raw:
Hi @{5cf75629ff02b50ea27b2817} , thanks a lot for the explanation. Let me re-iterate my understanding from your previous comment.

‌

1. running `subt_testbed` is  equivalent to running `ign launch tunnel_circuit_practice.ign robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_1` on my local machine.
2. cloudsim testing is completely for our validation purpose of the “to be submitted“ docker image.

Let me know if the above 2 points are correct or not.

‌
content.html:

‌

  1. running subt_testbed is equivalent to running ign launch tunnel_circuit_practice.ign robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_1 on my local machine.
  2. cloudsim testing is completely for our validation purpose of the “to be submitted“ docker image.
